snippet.title: Arc Raiders– Ultimate Beginner’s Guide (Top Gameplay Tips You Need to Know!)
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders is available on October 30 on PC, Xbox, and PS5: https://sbx.gg/arcraiders-codiak

If you're brand new to Arc Raiders, or looking for that leg up on launch day, this Ultimate Beginners Guide has you covered. Codiak breaks out important skill choices, progression tips, what upgrades you should be focusing on, and how to approach each match in an optimal way.

Overview - 0:00
The Basics - 1:02
Building Your Loadout - 5:45
Skill Tree Tips - 8:54
Progression - 11:33
Upgrade Tips - 13:12
Essential Tips - 15:24
Advanced Tips Guide - 20:00
